supermarkets.name: All Supermarkets

hours.title: NHS
hours.description: During NHS hour, a pass should be required in all stores

hours.title: Bagless shopping
hours.description: Most stores have reverted bagless shopping, particularly for online delivery

hours.title: Online delivery
hours.description: All stores are struggling to manage online delivery at the moment. Most stores are not accepting new online delivery customers.

hours.title: Restrictions
hours.description: Most stores are restricting the amount of all or specific high-demand products in a single purchase.

hours.title: Opening hours
hours.description: All stores have reduced opening hours to mange stock replenishment and cleaning.

hours.title: Cafes and Food Counters
hours.description: All stores have closed cafes and food counters.

supermarkets.notes: The above information may not apply to all supermarkets.

supermarkets.name: Sainsburys

hours.title: NHS and social care workers
hours.description: Monday to Saturday, with NHS ID from 07.30 to 08.00

hours.title: Elderly, Disabled and Carers
hours.description: Monday, Wednesday and Friday, 08.00 to 09.00

hours.title: Online delivery
hours.description: Prioritised online delivery slots for elderly, disabled and vulnerable customers.

supermarkets.notes: All supermarkets will be open from 08.00 to 20.00 Monday – Saturday

supermarkets.name: Tesco

hours.title: NHS
hours.description: Sunday, before opening, browsing hour for NHS workers.

hours.title: Elderly and Most Vulnerable
hours.description: 9 - 10am - Monday, Wednesday and Friday

supermarkets.notes: Excludes express stores. All stores closing at 10pm.

supermarkets.name: Waitrose

hours.title: NHS Workers
hours.description: Daily essentials kept aside, priority treatment at checkout

hours.title: Elderly and vulnerable shoppers, as well as those who look after them
hours.description: First opening hour in all supermarkets

supermarkets.notes: Limited customer numbers in store, 2 meter rule marshals, staff protection.

hours.title: NHS
hours.description: Tuesday and Friday for the first hour

hours.title: Elderly and Most Vulnerable
hours.description: Monday and Thursday for the first hour

supermarkets.name: Asda

hours.title: NHS
hours.description: Larger stores every Monday, Wednesday and Friday from 8am to 9am.

hours.title: Elderly and Most Vulnerable
hours.description: No ongoing commitment.

supermarkets.notes: Reduced opening times in stores, see website.

supermarkets.name: Morrisons

hours.title: NHS
hours.description: 7am to 8am, Monday to Saturday

hours.title: Elderly and Most Vulnerable
hours.description: No ongoing commitment.

supermarkets.notes: Installing protective screens. Opening hours 8-8 during week.

supermarkets.name: Co-Op

hours.title: NHS
hours.description: 8–9am Monday to Saturday, and 10– 11am on Sundays (Not dedicated)

hours.title: Those at higher risk and the people who care for them
hours.description: 8–9am Monday to Saturday, and 10– 11am on Sundays (Not dedicated)

hours.title: Online Orders
hours.description: No priority, but orders limited to 20 items

supermarkets.notes: They say: "Our colleagues will be prioritising and caring for vulnerable customers."

hours.title: NHS
hours.description: Final hour of trading, Monday - Saturday (with ID)

hours.title: Elderly and vulnerable
hours.description: First hour of trading, Monday - Saturday

hours.title: All Customers
hours.description: No commitment to priority or early opening
